remarks: Value of the orthogonal complement of a Hilbert lattice element.  The orthogonal complement of ` A ` is the set of vectors that are orthogonal to all vectors in ` A ` .  (Contributed by NM, 8-Aug-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
